item.title: Prometheus Basic Ideas
item.description: This blog will give a short introduction for the open source project Prometheus. It is based on the official website and an online book in Chinese, but I also added some explainations and understanding from myself to help any green hands to better understand it and its usage. The first two parts will offer a brief intro to Prometheus. The third part will guide to download it and open the service.
